title: Charge your Apple Watch and iPhone on the go with 20% off this Anker charger
content:
Macworld

This new Anker MagGo Power Bank is one of Anker’s coolest products, allowing you to charge both your iPhone and your Apple Watch on the go. And the best part is that it’s already on sale for $65 for Prime members at Amazon.

This 10,000mAH power bank is super compact and easy to carry around with a handy loop strap built in. It also has enough juice to charge your phone completely almost twice via the built-in USB-C cable. With 30W output, your phone will be back to 100 percent in no time. The built-in MagGo charger delivers 5W output for your watch, and you can either wrap the watch around the power bank or lift the magnetic bit and attach the smart gadget to it while it lies on your desk.

Bottom line, if you own an iPhone and Apple Watch, this is a perfect solution for your charging emergencies, so go snatch it up for $65 with Amazon Prime while you still can.

Get a fast power bank for your iPhone and Apple Watch
Buy it now at Amazon
